data.name: ReadDebt
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OB_TRN_ID, OB_TRN_TYP, OB_TRN_AMT, CSP_SUP_NUMBER, CPA_SUP_TYPE, OTY_TYPE from CKT_OB_TRN where (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp) and (OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, DUE_DT, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, ADC_DT, RETIRED_DT from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrGeneratedId = OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailStatusHistory
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, OTR_TYPE, OTR_ID, CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OBG_ID, OB_TRN_ST_CD, OTY_TYPE, RSN_TXT from CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS where (DISCONTINUE_DT = @discontinueDt) and (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE)
